msbt.message: ! There you are, darling! Come with me! I need to take you somewhere right away.
There you are, ! At last! I feel like I've been lurking about here for eternity. Well, I found you. Now, I need you to come with me!
! There you are! Good thing I waited here. I'd have been in trouble if I didn't find you. Anyhoo, I really need you to come with me right now. No time to explain! Let's go!
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!

Can you believe it? We all got together and planned a birthday party for youand you had no idea! Quite the surprise, isn't it? Of course, it wouldn't be a birthday party without the birthday cake Go ahead, press  to blow out your candles. And don't forget to make a wish!

We all got together and planned a birthday party for you, my dear. Quite the surprise, wasn't it?Of course, this year isn't a leap year, so we had to do it a teensy bit early. Still, I do hope you like it. Now, let's get this party underway! First things firstpress  to blow out those candles and make a wish!

Oh , I know your birthday comes only once every four years. Today must be a very special day for you. Which is why we wanted to throw you a party An EXTRA-special surprise party! My goodness, I do hope you enjoy it!And now it's time for my favorite part. See that cake? Go ahead and press  to blow out those candles!
! Where do you think you're going? You have to blow out your candles, !
My goodness, ! You didn't blow out your candles! It's bad luck, .
! Where do you think you're going? You're today's guest of honor! Your cake awaits!
The happiest of birthdays, my dear !
We have a special present we picked out just for you! My goodness, I do hope you like it.
We wanted to make this a day that you'll never forget!

Just wait until you see what's inside! I do hope it's something you can use. Oh! That's right! I nearly forgot! We still have one more present for you. I'll go get it ready. You just wait right there!

Oh dear, ! It seems your pockets are too full to hold your present. Let's seehmmm I know! I'll just have your present delivered to your house later. And darling, there's more. We have one more present to give you! Wait right there. I'll get it ready.
Look up at the ceiling! Voila! It's a piñata!I must tell you, we all put our hearts and souls into making it just for you!
And guess what There's a surprise present inside of it for you as well, ! I'll give you a stick, and then all you'll have to do is give that piñata all you've got.
Take your time, ! When you're ready, come talk to me!
Aha! Ready to go, my dear? This is VERY exciting!Now, go ahead and stand under the piñata for me!

Now, it may not look it, but that piñata is one tough cookie! One little tippy-tap won't do a thing. The trick is to hit it hard and fast, my dear. When I say "Start," mash  with enthusiasm! Alrighty, prepare yourself Ready Start!!
Well, well! You gave it what for! You know, you aren't half bad at this.I do hope you enjoy the birthday cupcakes inside!

My goodness, ! You really know how to swing a piñata bat! You broke it clean open! And just look at those fabulous birthday cupcakes! You know, we all pitched in on the ingredients and baked them especially for you.
Well done, ! That was totally vicious, darling! Are you a piñata pro, perchance? Now, as you can see, the piñata was filled with birthday cupcakes. I do hope you like the flavor!
Go on, don't be shy. Take your birthday cupcakes.
We made a big batch, so perhaps you could share them with our friends who couldn't make it today.
I nearly forgot! You can't carry anything else right now.Not to worry. I'll send the cupcakes to your house too. Be sure to grab them when you get home.
Oh! Your pockets are so full, you can't carry these!Never you mind. I'll just have to send them to your house later.

Well, well, my dear Your Birthday Surprise Event is a wrap!Watching you break that piñata nearly moved me to tears What a powerful moment it was! , all that's left for you to do now is enjoy your party to your heart's content!
Going home, are you?Well, I'm so happy you came today. And I do hope we've helped get your next year off to a fabulous start!
Oh! Please wait! You mustn't leave without first breaking the piñata we made for you, !
W-wait! Where are you going? You can't leave the piñata unbroken! It's bad luck, !
Do you not see that piñata we made for you?! Please, come back and break it before you go, !
Blowing out candles is easy as can be, you know. You simply take a big breath and press .
Go ahead, press  to blow out your candles! Everyone's waiting for the big moment!

The moment the candles go out why, that's the most important moment of the party! Needless to say, it's acceptable to take your timeto truly savor your moment in the spotlight. Then, when you're ready, you simply take a big breathand you press  to blow them all out!
Hitting a piñata is just sosatisfying! Don't you think?It's a fabulous way to burn off some of your frustrations while, at the same time, earning tasty treats. I call that a win-win, darling!

This place looks so festive, what with the birthday decorations up. It's like a different room entirely. You know, it might be fun to leave your room like this all year. Then every day would feel like a party!

Aren't piñatas simply delightful? You just never know what you'll find inside when you break them open! Of course, it's usually candy and other sweetsIf only it was nail polish, earrings, and gift certificates to the spa instead! Ah well, a girl can dream.
You're the guest of honor at today's party, . I hope you're enjoying the spotlight. I must say, you do look fabulous. Happiness is in fashion, after all.
I just LOVE that moment when the piñata bursts open, don't you?You never know when it's going to happen. It's terribly suspenseful!I confess, I scream a little bit every time.
